title: What are the best motivational videos you know? - Quora

response.answer_text: NOW HEAR ME ON THIS: Watch this two minute video, bookmark the answer and watch it again when you need motivation. (Link I have mentioned at the end of this answer.) So this video is famous advert of Nike called as Dream Crazy. The main theme is this: "Don’t ask if your dreams are crazy. Ask if they’re crazy enough." What makes it different from other motivational videos? Best inspiring lines.Real examples of people.(The ad features the stories of 16 athletes with inspirational stories, ranging from Charlie Jabaley, an Ironman who completely change his life, to tennis legend Serena Williams.)How to overcome? (The two-minute video is narrated by Colin Kaepernick and features many athletes who have overcome odds to be where they are today. )Perfect music.To become what others think we can't.Teaches to develop a Mentality to think big.Not to be afraid of failures.To rise up every time we fail.All this in a single 2 minute video, awesome!! I will share you some lines and images of this video. It begins like this:   📌The ad begins with skateboard Nyjah Huston. Huston, 23, has been skateboarding since he was 5-years-old. In 2011, Huston made history when he became the first and only skater to do a backside 270 nose blunt-slide at the inaugural Street League championship tournament.  📌Isaiah Bird, a 10-year-old wrestler, also appears in the ad. In addition to wrestling, Bird, who was born without legs, also swims, runs track, surfs, and plays sports like soccer and football. Wrestling, though, is his specialty, and he's been competing in the sport since he was in kindergarten.   📌  📌  📌  📌  📌    📌   📌    📌    📌  📌   📌    📌   📌Final message: “It's crazy until you do it. Just do it.”   Better watch it. Rather than reading it. Chills guaranteed.
